281149.家具を１こ 納品トースターに 納品することで\n『レプリカ家具』から 配置上限数:
When you deliver a piece of furniture to the Delivery Toaster, it becomes a piece of replica furniture that you can take out as
many times as you like... Once a piece of furniture becomes a replica, it will no longer be listed as an accessory in the item
menu... To place replica furniture, go to "Replica Furniture" in the "Housing" menu, or "Replica Furniture" in the "Doors" menu...
Replica furniture can't be given to others... Also, some furniture and garden tools cannot be replicated...

281150.家具を１こ 納品トースターに 納品することで\n『レプリカ家具』から 配置上限数:
When you deliver a piece of furniture to the Delivery Toaster, it becomes a piece of replica furniture that you can take out as
many times as you like... Once a piece of furniture becomes a replica, it will no longer be listed as an accessory in the item
menu... To place replica furniture, go to "Replica Furniture" in the "Housing" menu, or "Replica Furniture" in the "Doors" menu...
Replica furniture can't be given to others... Also, some furniture and garden tools cannot be replicated...

281157.<%sL_FURNITURE>が\nレプリカ家具に なりました。\n<br>\n:
<%sL_FURNITURE> is now replica furniture... To place replica furniture, go to "Housing" in the "Tools" menu, or "Replica Furniture"

281158.<%sL_FURNITURE>が\nレプリカ庭具に なりました。\n<br>\n:
<%sL_FURNITURE> is now a replica garden tool... To place a replica garden tool, go to "Housing" in the "Tools" menu, or "Replica
Garden Tools" in the "Doors" menu...

283070.『ハウジング』内に 『家具・庭具リスト』が\n移動になりました。また 新たに \:
In Housing, the furniture and garden tools list has been moved. And we've added a new feature called "Place Replica Furniture".
Place replica furniture will only appear within your own address.

283071.『ハウジング』内に 『家具・庭具リスト』が\n移動になりました。また 新たに \:
In Housing, the furniture and garden tools list has been moved. Also, we've added a new feature called "Place a Replica Garden
Fixture." Place a replica garden tool will only appear at your address...
